name: classygeeks/potion
description: Potion is a pure PHP asset manager for Laravel based off of Assetic.

suggest.leafo/lessphp: Integration with the lessphp LESS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp: Integration with the scssphp SCSS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp-compass: Integration with the scssphp SCSS Compass compiler
suggest.natxet/CssMin: Integration with the scssphp CSSMin compiler
suggest.ptachoire/cssembed: Integration with phpcssembed to embed data uris
suggest.patchwork/jsqueeze: Integration with the JSqueeze JavaScript compressor
